sentences.text: This paper describes FERRET , an interactive question-answering -LRB- Q/A -RRB- system designed to address the challenges of integrating automatic Q/A applications into real-world environments .

FERRET utilizes a novel approach to Q/A known as predictive questioning which attempts to identify the questions -LRB- and answers -RRB- that users need by analyzing how a user interacts with a system while gathering information related to a particular scenario .
